title: SEC Hits Out at Terraform Labs Law Firm's 'Staggering' $166 Million Retainer
description: The regulator argued that Terraform Labs "siphoned" the money into an "opaque slush fund for its lawyers."

title: Community-Driven Ecosystem Accelerators ‘A Vital Component of Crypto Funding Mechanisms’ – Elie Le Rest
description: Large institutions will fully embrace decentralized finance (defi) only when they are confident that their trade counterparties will comply with sanctions and other international laws, argues Elie Le Rest, CEO of Colony Lab. However, Le Rest, also an angel investor, said trade counterparties can still demonstrate their willingness to adhere to rules by implementing gated […]

title: Dogecoin futures break $1 Billion barrier in historic surge
description: Dogecoin (DOGE) futures have surged to unprecedented levels, reaching a record open interest of $1 billion. This milestone reflects an overwhelming bullish sentiment among traders, with nearly 70% of these bets favoring the long side. Dogecoin’s 40% surge fuels blockchain betting trend Dogecoin has seen a remarkable uptick, soaring over 40%. This surge adds to […]

title: Shiba Inu’s Shibarium eyes billion user milestone
description: Kaal Dhairya, a prominent developer within the Shiba Inu ecosystem, has recently vocalized his optimism regarding the future expansion of the Shiba Inu projects, particularly Shibarium and SHIB. title: Uniswap introduces new features to enhance user experience
description: Uniswap, the leading decentralized exchange platform, has unveiled three innovative features designed to elevate the swapping experience for its users. The recent additions include the Uniswap Extension, Limit Orders, and Data & Insights. title: Alt Season Begins: Analyst Maps 5 Altcoins Picks For 55x Profits
description:
Breaking through a significant barrier, Bitcoin has surged above $60,000, marking its highest value since November 2021. As this event sparks renewed bullish sentiment in the market, it also ushers in the much-anticipated alt season. Analysts have identified a roster of altcoins that have significant profit potential, further fueling the enthusiasm over the dynamic crypto […]
